description: Returns the current status of a query for the Amazon CloudWatch Internet Monitor query interface, for a specified query ID and monitor. When you run a query, check the status to make sure that the query has SUCCEEDED before you review the results.

parameters.name: QueryId
parameters.description: The ID of the query that you want to return the status for. A QueryId is an internally-generated dentifier for a specific query.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status for a query.
